verses.text: And now, O ye \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, this \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \add is\add* for you.

If ye will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and if ye will not \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* to \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, I will even \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w curse|strong="H3994"\w* upon you, and I will \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* your \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w*: yea, I have \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* them already, because ye do not \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* to \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

Behold, I will \w corrupt|strong="H1605"\w* your \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H2219"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w* upon your \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, \add even\add* the \w dung|strong="H6569"\w* of your solemn \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w*; and \add one\add* shall take you \w away|strong="H5375"\w* with it.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft corrupt: or, reprove\f*\f + \fr 2.3 \ft spread: Heb. scatter\f*\f + \fr 2.3 \ft one…: or, it shall take you away to it\f*

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* this \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* unto you, that my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* might be with \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

My \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* was with him of \w life|strong="H2416"\w* and \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them to him \add for\add* the \w fear|strong="H4172"\w* wherewith he \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* me, and was \w afraid|strong="H2865"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

The \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* was in his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* was not \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: he \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* with me in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w equity|strong="H4334"\w*, and did \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

For the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* should \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and they should \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* at his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for he \add is\add* the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

But ye are \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; ye have caused \w many|strong="H7227"\w* to \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* at the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; ye have \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft stumble at: or, fall in\f*

Therefore have I also \w made|strong="H5414"\w* you \w contemptible|strong="H0959"\w* and \w base|strong="H8217"\w* before all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w according|strong="H6310"\w* as ye have not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, but have been \w partial|strong="H5375"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft have been…: or, lifted up the face against: Heb. accepted faces\f*

Have we not all \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*? hath not \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* us? why do we deal \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* against his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, by \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*?

¶ \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, and an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* is \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; for \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* the \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*, and hath \w married|strong="H1166"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of a \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft loved: or, ought to love\f*

¶ Yet ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Wherefore|strong="H4100"\w*? Because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath been \w witness|strong="H5749"\w* between thee and the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, against whom thou hast dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*: yet \add is\add* she thy \w companion|strong="H2278"\w*, and the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And did not he \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*? Yet had he the \w residue|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*. And wherefore \w one|strong="H0259"\w*? That he might \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* a \w godly|strong="H0430"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*. Therefore take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to your \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and let none deal \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* against the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of his \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.\f + \fr 2.15 \ft residue: or, excellency\f*\f + \fr 2.15 \ft godly…: Heb. seed of God\f*\f + \fr 2.15 \ft treacherously: or, unfaithfully\f*
